Our Process

End-to-end solar project execution with precision and excellence

From Concept to Commissioning

Our proven 8-step process ensures successful project delivery every time

1

Engineering & Design

Detailed system design and optimization tailored to site conditions

2

Site Assessment

Comprehensive evaluation of site conditions and energy requirements

3

Procurement

Sourcing high-quality components from trusted manufacturers

4

Project Management

Strong planning, risk management, and timeline execution

5

Installation

Professional on-site execution by certified technical teams

6

Commissioning

System testing, grid integration, and performance verification

7

Performance Optimization

Ongoing monitoring and optimization for peak efficiency

8

Quality Assurance

Adherence to regulatory and quality standards throughout

Typical Project Timeline

1-2 Weeks

Assessment & Design

Site evaluation and system design

2-4 Weeks

Approvals

Documentation and permits

4-8 Weeks

Installation

Equipment and construction

1-2 Weeks

Commissioning

Testing and grid connection
